Package sound

This package contains classes and methods to easily manipulate and play sounds.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SoundFilter
    The SoundFilter interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractSoundFilter
    Gives a default implementation of the SoundFilter interface.
    ClipDelegate
    A class with methods used to get a Clip Object to work even more easily than it already does.
    FilteredSoundStream
    This FilterInputStream applies a filter to a Sound.
    SoundManager
    The sound manager class manages sounds.
    SoundManager.LoopingByteInputStream
    A ByteArrayInputStream that loops over an byte array until close is called.
    SoundManager.Sound
    This class is simply a wrapper around a byte array.
    SoundManager.SoundPlayerThread
    This is the Thread that lets the music play.

Package sound Description

This package contains classes and methods to easily manipulate and play sounds. This package is based upon The Sound API. Look on the link for information about the Sound API.
Since:
9-8-2014
Author:
stefanboodt
